recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.cooking_method:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 
2. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add onions and garlic and sauté until onions are translucent. 
3. Add ground beef and cook until browned. 
4. Add diced tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes. 
5. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
